alert.note: Alert for Campbell; Scott (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 1:12PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT MORGAN...WEST CENTRAL ANDERSON... SOUTHWESTERN CAMPBELL AND CENTRAL SCOTT COUNTIES THROUGH 300 PM EDT... At 212 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Helenwood to 9 miles west of Wartburg. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Wartburg, Huntsville, Helenwood, Sunbright, Rugby, High Point, Smokey Junction, Robbins, Rugby State Park, and Deerlodge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for east Tennessee.
